title: Dianne McIntytre & George Faison, Ohio Sky and Jared Bendis
teaser: Dee Perry welcomes choreographers Dianne McIntyre and George Faison to preview the International Association of Blacks in Dance Conference taking place in Cleveland this week.  Plus we spotlight the new CD by Cellar Door rockers Ohio Sky.  And our resident tech guru Jared Bendis of Case Western Reserve University shares stories from The International Consumer Electronics Show (CES).
